experience.text: I got a pleasure to work as a freelancer for Prague based agency in Vue 2 and 3, mostly focusing on upgrading their large projects to vue 3.

I have been working on medium-sized projects as a freelancer for various, mostly danish clients (such as Frontløberne, Intitut X, Verifa, Parasport dk). If the project allows I try to setup simple backend or my own design solution

I had an opportunity to contribute to numerous large-scale projects primarily built with Next.js, Typescript and react, communicating with backend through openAPI and swagger, all done in the agency-like environment. Worked with Redux toolkit more closely and got introduced to material UI and ANT fields.
My responsibilities included rebuilding and optimizing few extensive websites using mostly Jekyll and liquid, generating content from markdown files and performing frontend maintenance tasks.

references.title: NGP Prague
references.text: in 2023 I started learning Vue and while working as a freelancer for Brainz Discruptive based in Prague I have upgraded large and beautiful website for National Gallery Prague from Options API & Vue 2 to Vue 3 in composition API

references.title: Nåbø Aarhus
references.text: interactive map (integrated OpenStreetMap API). for collecting cultural institutions scattered all over the city of Aarhus and Tromso, Norway. Data are collected from google sheets. And also submitted there through contact form

references.title: Sweet City
references.text: A project built in React to promote the upcoming local elections and to get young people more involved in the politics. new events filled as markdown files via github repo. Generated timeline feed by running custom script.

references.title: PipeGame
references.text: I coded my favourite old MS DOS game in order to get some challenge in javascript with live chart of highest scores stored in firebase. Current version is desktop only.

references.title: My portfolio
references.text: My own blog where I can organise my activities and illustartions into different categories. Tagging & blogging system, interactive pagination, shoping cart, now hidden. Liking feature - likes stored in firebase. Cart items & like arrays stored in local storage. Also implemented Stripe payment with own Node server hosted on Heroku. For now removed

references.title: Prague suburbs
references.text: Nine chapters about the trasitions that Prague suburbs undertook over the years. Made my own font and provided lots of custom js animations.
